content: the base of this cute little bag is crocheted first then since the diameter of the base is not increased the edges spiral upwards to form the sides for more information about this pattern please look at my blog 1 and for more about tapestry crochet please look at my tapestry crochet web page 2 1 https //www tapestrycrochet com/blog/ p=388 2 https //www tapestrycrochet com/
